TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi UITypeEditor extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供可用來設計值編輯器的基底類別，這些值編輯器可提供使用者介面 (UI)，以表示並編輯所支援資料類型的物件值。

span.span: Provides a base class that can be used to design value editors that can provide a user interface (UI) for representing and editing the values of objects of the supported data types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供基底類別，您可以從衍生並擴充實作的設計階段環境的自訂類型編輯器。The class provides a base class that you can derive from and extend to implement a custom type editor for the design-time environment. 一般而言，您的自訂型別編輯器互動控制項。Typically, your custom type editor interacts with the control. 自訂型別編輯器適合的情況下的文字方塊中的值編輯器不足，無法有效地選取 特定類型的值。Custom type editors are useful in situations where a text-box value editor is insufficient to effectively select the values of certain types. 若要實作自訂的設計階段 UI 類型編輯器，您必須執行下列步驟：To implement a custom design-time UI type editor, you must perform the following steps: - 定義衍生自 的類別。Define a class that derives from . - 覆寫方法以處理使用者介面、 使用者輸入的處理，以及指派值。Override the method to handle the user interface, user input processing, and value assignment. - 覆寫方法，以通知類型的編輯器樣式，將會使用編輯器 中的 屬性 視窗。Override the method to inform the Properties window of the type of editor style that the editor will use. 您可以新增額外支援繪製值的表示法，在 [屬性] 視窗中執行下列步驟：You can add additional support for painting a value's representation in the Properties window by performing the following steps: - 覆寫方法，以表示此編輯器支援顯示值的表示法。Override the method to indicate that the editor supports displaying the value's representation. - 覆寫方法，以實作的值的表示法顯示。Override the method to implement the display of the value's representation. - 覆寫建構函式方法編輯器 中應該有初始設定行為。Override the constructor method if the editor should have initialization behavior. > [!NOTE] > 類別不支援由右至左 (RTL) 配置。The class does not support right-to-left (RTL) layouts. 如需強化設計階段支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For more information about enhancing design-time support, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). 如需有關實作，請參閱[使用者介面型別編輯器概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f068b4ea-6e8c-4c0b-aefd-188b337240da)。For more information on implementing a , see [User Interface Type Editors Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f068b4ea-6e8c-4c0b-aefd-188b337240da). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範可以相關聯的整數、 雙線或浮動屬性使用提供在設計模式中的 [屬性] 視窗的角度選取項目介面。The following code example demonstrates that a can be associated with an integer, double, or float property using an to provide an angle selection interface from the Properties window in design mode. 這個範例會使用介面，以在設計模式中的 [屬性] 視窗中顯示的下拉式清單控制項。This example uses the interface to display a drop-down control in the Properties window in design mode. 編譯程式碼，並將組件加入至工具箱使用**自訂工具箱**命令**工具**Visual Studio 的功能表。Compile the code and add the assembly to the Toolbox using the **Customize Toolbox** command on the **Tools** menu of Visual Studio. 建立的執行個體`AngleTestControl`按一下下拉式清單旁邊的按鈕來設定屬性，使用編輯器 中 屬性 視窗中 角度 屬性。Create an instance of the `AngleTestControl` and click the drop-down button next to the Angle property in the Properties window to configure the property using the editor. [!code-cpp[AngleEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AngleEditor/CPP/angleeditor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AngleEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AngleEditor/CS/angleeditor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AngleEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AngleEditor/VB/angleeditor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用由 方法指示的編輯器樣式，來編輯指定物件的值。

span.span: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by the method.
The new value of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會啟動使用者介面進行數值編輯，而且當使用者嘗試編輯這個編輯器會設定為編輯的值類型的值由 [屬性] 視窗中呼叫。This method launches the user interface for value editing, and is called by the Properties window when a user attempts to edit the value of a type that this editor is configured to edit the value of. 提供的服務提供者，使編輯器可以取得任何必要的服務。A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.

span.span: Paints a representation of the value of an object using the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編輯器應該繪製在指定的矩形界限內。Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle. 這個矩形表示要繪製的表示法中之值的 [屬性] 視窗的區域。This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，所指定的矩形將會根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目調整大小：Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```

param.name: canvas

span.span: Paints a representation of the value of the specified object to the specified canvas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編輯器應該繪製在指定的矩形界限內。Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle. 這個矩形表示要繪製的表示法中之值的 [屬性] 視窗的區域。This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，所指定的矩形將會根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目調整大小：Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```
